about_the_game:
StarDust is a game about transgalactic exploration, discovery, battle, and conquest.

The game currently only features the single player and multiplayer battle modes, where you  find yourself in a three-dimensionally looped "Singularity" in outer space to fight it out for your freedom.

Weapons include lasers, dumbfire and homing missiles, some of which have huge detonations.

A future release will include a campaign mode where you explore, discover and take over nearby inhabitable planets. The random planet generator that will be used in campaign mode is currently available to create your own planets in the Planet Generator screen.

The soundtrack includes two great pieces of music by Chris Haigh and Ian Dorsch as well as motion-picture quality sound effects.
detailed_description:
StarDust is a game about transgalactic exploration, discovery, battle, and conquest.

The game currently only features the single player and multiplayer battle modes, where you  find yourself in a three-dimensionally looped "Singularity" in outer space to fight it out for your freedom.

Weapons include lasers, dumbfire and homing missiles, some of which have huge detonations.

A future release will include a campaign mode where you explore, discover and take over nearby inhabitable planets. The random planet generator that will be used in campaign mode is currently available to create your own planets in the Planet Generator screen.

The soundtrack includes two great pieces of music by Chris Haigh and Ian Dorsch as well as motion-picture quality sound effects.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 14
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 14
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: StarDust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 3 GHz quad core
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3

short_description: Welcome to Leon Skum's world of advanced technology. In this age, everybody who is anybody has their own Personal Spaceship to fly in. Find weapons, perform missions, conquer enemies.
